hero.title: Your AI Character
hero.description: Create, view, and chat with AI characters. An open-source platform for character card management and AI conversations.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: A complete toolkit for AI character enthusiasts

charxViewer.title: CharX Viewer
charxViewer.description: View and inspect character cards, lorebooks, and assets from CharX files. Everything runs locally in your browser.

p2pSharing.title: P2P CharX Sharing
p2pSharing.description: Share character files directly with others using peer-to-peer technology. No server uploads, instant transfers.

connect.title: Multi-Character Chat
connect.description: Create chat sessions with multiple AI characters. Invite friends and let characters interact with each other.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Upload
dragDrop.description: Simply drop your .charx files to instantly view their contents

cardInfo.title: Complete Card Information
cardInfo.description: View character details, system prompts, greetings, and more

clientSide.title: 100% Client-Side
clientSide.description: Your files never leave your browser - complete privacy guaranteed

qrCode.title: QR Code & Share Links
qrCode.description: Generate QR codes and shareable links for easy mobile transfers

webrtc.title: WebRTC Direct Transfer
webrtc.description: Files transfer directly between browsers - no server storage

password.title: Optional Password Protection
password.description: Secure your shares with password protection if needed

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data stays on your device. CharX files are processed entirely in your browser.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Built with modern web technologies for instant loading and smooth interactions.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Fully transparent codebase. Audit, contribute, and customize to your needs.

ready.title: Ready to Get Started?
ready.description: Jump right in and explore your character files with our privacy-focused viewer.

connectShowcase.title: Chat with Multiple Characters
connectShowcase.description: Create a session where multiple AI characters can interact with each other. Perfect for roleplay scenarios and collaborative storytelling.

realtime.title: Real-time Chat
realtime.description: Instant message delivery between all participants using P2P technology

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Replies
aiPowered.description: Characters can auto-reply using AI, creating dynamic conversations

multiParty.title: Up to 8 Characters
multiParty.description: Invite friends to join with their own characters via QR code or link

charx.title: CharX Viewer
charx.subtitle: View character cards, lorebooks, and assets â€” runs entirely in your browser

upload.title: Upload CharX File
upload.description: Drag and drop a .charx file or click to browse
upload.browseMultiple: or click to browse files (multiple selection supported)
upload.unsupportedFile: Unsupported file: {names}. Only .charx files are supported.
upload.unsupportedFiles: Unsupported files: {names}. Only .charx files are supported.
upload.realmPlaceholder: Paste RisuRealm URL or character ID...
upload.realmHint: Supports realm.risuai.net URLs or character UUIDs (e.g., https://realm.risuai.net/character/CHARACTER_ID or CHARACTER_ID)

realmError.INVALID_CHARX: Character not found on RisuRealm. Please check the ID.
realmError.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large ({size}). Please download and upload manually.
realmError.DOWNLOAD_FAILED: Failed to download from RisuRealm. Please try again.

upload.demoHint: Load a sample character to explore the viewer

empty.noAssetsInFile: No assets found in this character file

files.title: Files
files.dropMore: Drop more .charx files or click to browse

export.title: Save Character to Database
export.description: Save this character and lorebook to your local database for easy access in chat.

character.title: Character
character.description: Character card data including name, description, personality, and messages.

lorebook.title: Lorebook
lorebook.description: Lorebook entries will be saved for context injection during chats.
lorebook.noLorebook: No lorebook found in this character file.

export.info: Once saved, you can start chatting with this character from the Chat page.

infoMessages.databaseReady: Database ready. You can now save the character.

success.title: Character saved successfully
success.description: {name} has been saved to your database.

error.title: Failed to save character
error.description: An error occurred while saving. Please try again.
error.databaseNotReady: Database is not ready. Please wait a moment and try again.
error.databaseInitFailed: Failed to initialize database. Please refresh the page and try again.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page.

charx.filesExcluded: {count} files were excluded due to size limits (>50MB):

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or return to the home page.

charx.title: CharX Viewer Error
charx.description: Something went wrong while loading the CharX viewer. This might be due to a corrupted file or browser compatibility issue.

footer.description: Open-source AI character platform. Create, share, and interact with AI characters.

p2p.title: P2P CharX Sharing
p2p.subtitle: Share character files directly with others. Files transfer peer-to-peer, never touching our servers.
p2p.privacyNote: Files are transferred directly between browsers using WebRTC. Your files never touch our servers.
p2p.confirmSubtitle: Review your file and optionally set a password.
p2p.passwordPlaceholder: Enter a password to protect your file...
p2p.passwordHint: Leave empty for no password protection.
p2p.sharingSubtitle: Keep this tab open. Share the link below with others to let them download.
p2p.stopSharingConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop sharing?
p2p.stopSharingDescription: All active downloads will be interrupted.
p2p.sharingWarning: P2P sharing will be disconnected if you leave or refresh the page. Keep this tab open.

download.title: Download CharX File
download.connectionFailed: Could not connect to the uploader. They may have closed their browser.
download.notFound: Share link not found or expired
download.notFoundDescription: The file you're looking for is no longer available. The uploader may have stopped sharing.
download.readyDescription: Click the button below to start downloading.
download.completeDescription: Your file has been downloaded successfully.
download.charxDescription: Save this character and lorebook to your database with one click.
download.troubleshooting: Taking too long? The uploader may be behind a firewall or have closed their browser.
download.sharePrompt: Do you want to share CharX with others?

leftPanel.deleteCharacter: Delete "{name}"? This will also delete all associated chats.

centerPanel.selectCharacter: Select a character and chat to start
centerPanel.createFromLeft: Or create a new character from the left panel
centerPanel.configureApiKey: Please configure your Gemini API key to start chatting.
centerPanel.clearAllMessages: Clear all messages in this chat?

rightPanel.selectCharacter: Select a character to view details
rightPanel.deleteCharacter: Delete "{name}"? This will also delete all associated chats and cannot be undone.

editor.createPersonaDesc: Create a persona to represent yourself in chats.
editor.createCharacterDesc: Create a new character to chat with.
editor.descriptionCharacter: A brief description of your character
editor.firstMessagePlaceholder: The first message your character will send
editor.personalityPersona: Describe yourself, your interests, how you communicate...
editor.scenarioPlaceholder: The setting or context for conversations
editor.exampleDialoguePlaceholder: Example conversations to set the tone...

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your API settings. Your settings are stored locally.
settings.safetyDescription: Configure content safety filters. By default, all filters are turned off for unrestricted roleplay.

meta.title: Connect - Multi-Character Chat
meta.description: Create a session where AI characters can chat with each other

upload.title: Upload Character File
upload.description: Upload a .charx, .json, or .png file with embedded character data

photo.dropDescription: Drop an image or click to select. AI will generate a character based on the image.
photo.invalidType: Please select an image file (PNG, JPG, WebP, or GIF)
photo.tooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
photo.contextPlaceholder: e.g., 'This is a fantasy warrior' or 'Make them friendly'
photo.contextHint: Add hints to guide the character generation
photo.generateError: Failed to generate character. Please try again.
photo.noApiKey: Please configure your Gemini API key in Settings first.
photo.apiKeyDescription: To generate characters from photos, you need to configure your Gemini API key in Settings.

lobby.title: Waiting Room
lobby.hostDescription: Share the link below to invite others
lobby.guestDescription: Waiting for the host to start the chat
lobby.needMoreParticipants: Need at least 2 participants to start

join.title: Join Session
join.subtitle: Select a character to join the chat

errors.noPeer: Failed to connect to the network. Please refresh and try again.
errors.hostLeft: The host has ended the session
errors.sessionFullDescription: This session has reached the maximum number of participants.
errors.connectionFailedDescription: Could not connect to the session. The host may have left or there's a network issue.
